attributes.action: Do not allow any of the Jihadi brides to return to the UK
attributes.additional_details: We need to focus on our own crisis such as homelessness, families in poverty depending on food banks, our NHS. These brides show no remorse or regret, what about the families of the people ISIS have murdered, we cannot accept them back, you have to listen to the people.
attributes.background: The British people are furious that the government would even consider such a thing. They pose a significant threat to the public, they left to support terrorists and as they have stated, they regret nothing! The government need to start listening to its people and refuse to have them back.
